GUILDINFO_DESCRIPTION: This command is used to access a guild's embed, containing member details, vault, crafting, boosts, and other guild features depending on if it's your guild as well as permissions.
BUFF_DESC_2: Increase the amount of **Shards** and **Silver** earned from quests
BUFF_DESC_3: Reduce the costs of guild crafts
BUFF_DESC_5: Increase the speed of guild crafts
BUFF_DESC_6: Reduce the cost of repairing equipment
NOT_IN_GUILD: {{author}} You are not in any guild
CANT_FIND_GUILD: {{author}} The guild information could not be retrieved. Please provide a guild ID or mention a guild member.
GUILD_SERVER_MENU_DESC: Unlock Guild Server Invite feature for {{amount}} Gems
GUILD_IMAGE_MENU_DESC: Unlock Guild Image feature for 100 Wists
GUILD_LEVEL_ACCESS: Guild must be level 6 and have 10 members to access crafting **Guild Packages**
NAME_MODAL_LABEL: Enter the new name for your guild:
FOUNDERS_GM_NAME: Only **Founders** and **Guildmasters** can set the guild name
NAME_NEED_GEMS: You need **{{amount}}** **Gems** in vault to change the guild name
NAME_CHANGE_SUCCESS: Guild name has been successfully changed
FOUNDERS_GM_IMAGE: Only **Founders** and **Guildmasters** can set the guild image
IMAGE_CHANGE_SUCCESS: Guild image has been successfully set
FOUNDERS_GM_INVITE: Only **Founders** and **Guildmasters** can set the guild invite
INVITE_CHANGE_SUCCESS: Guild server invite has been successfully set
DONATE_MODAL_LABEL: Enter the amount and item name to donate:
DONATE_MODAL_PLACEHOLDER: Example: 15 Cubes | Silver and Wists cannot be withdrawn
CANNOT_DONATE_SWAPS: You cannot donate Swaps to vault
NO_AMOUNT_INV: You do not have that amount in your inventory
WITHDRAW_MODAL_LABEL: Enter the amount and item name to withdraw:
VAULT_NO_AMOUNT: There is not enough amount in the vault
NO_ITEM_VAULT: There are no items in the vault
DESCRIPTION_MODAL_PLACEHOLDER: Example: This is a nice guild
LONG_DESCRIPTION: Guild description must be less than **250** characters and less than **5** lines
NO_LINKS_IN_DESCRIPTION: You cannot use any links in the guild description
DESCRIPTION_CHANGE_SUCCESS: Guild description has been successfully set
BANNER_SET_SUCCESS: Guild banner has been successfully set
INVALID_GLOW: The **Glow** code you provided is either invalid or not in your inventory
COLOR_SET_SUCCESS: Embed color has been successfully updated
INVALID_PERMISSION:
Invalid permission level provided.

**Available levels:**
Adventurer: 0
Veteran: 1
GuildMaster: 2
Founder: 3
PERMISSION_SET_SUCCESS: Crafting permission level has been successfully updated
NOT_ENOUGH_CUBES: > There is not enough amount in the vault
BOOST_LEVEL_MAX: > The boost level has already reached its maximum
BOOST_EMBED_FOOTER: You can change which stats are boosted from the menu
CANNOT_HANDLE_MEMBERS: Guilds of over 40 members cannot be handled
SLOT_UNLOCKED:
Guild Member Slot unlocked ðŸ”“: 

+1 Member Slot
NOT_ENOUGH_SILVER: There is not enough **Silver** in the vault to unlock a slot
CANNOT_VIEW_VAULT: You cannot view the vaults of other guilds
SPREADSHEET_NOTE:
Use "{{prefix}}sheet guild" to get the spreadsheet of vault logs.
Wists and Silver cannot be withdrawn.
UPGRADE_EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
> **Guild Member Slots - {{memSlots}}** 
> Available guild slots: `{{availableSlots}}` 
> Slot unlock cost: `{{slotAmount}} {{slotCurrency}}` 

> **Guild Server Invite - {{inviteToggle}}** 
> Unlock cost: `{{inviteAmount}} {{inviteCurrency}}` 

> **Guild Image - {{imageToggle}}** 
> Unlock cost: `{{imageAmount}} {{imageCurrency}}`
UNLOCK_IMAGE_CONFIRM: Do you want to unlock guild image feature for **{{amount}}** **{{currency}}**?
UNLOCK_PERM_ERROR: Only **Founders** and **Guildmasters** can unlock this feature
UNLOCK_INVITE_CONFIRM: Do you want to unlock guild invite feature for **{{amount}}** **{{currency}}**?
NOT_ENOUGH_CRAFT_RESOURCES: There are not enough resources in the vault to craft this item
MAXIMUM_CRAFTING_LIMIT: Maximum crafting limit of **Guild Packages** reached
ITEM_EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
The items collected in your vault can be used to craft various items. 
Resources will be directly consumed from your vault. 
The crafted item will be directly transferred to your inventory. 
Permission level can be set by **Founders** and **Guildmasters**. 

Global **Guild Packages** count: {{packageCount}}/300 
Permission Level: **{{permLevel}}** 
Crafting time 
Crafting cost
SEASON_REWARD_NOTE: Guilds get **Charms** at the end of every season based on the achieved rank
INVITE_UNLOCK_SUCCESS: The guild server invite feature has been successfully unlocked
IMAGE_UNLOCK_SUCCESS: The guild image feature has been successfully unlocked
